TextpageLeftNav.bodyText:
Storage - Block Blob

Pricing Details

Block Blob Storage is used for stream processing and storing files, videos, pictures, backups and other non-structured documents or binary data. The following are the prices of a private Blob storage account with "hot" and "cool" access tiers. Extra Blob is also counted by Block Blob.

To check the price of Block Blob Storage in a general-purpose storage account, please check the Block Blob Pricing page.

Learn more

Data Storage Pricing

    *The following prices are tax-inclusive.

    Monthly storage capacity Local Redundant Storage (LRS) Zone Redundant Storage (ZRS) Geo-Redundant Storage (GRS) Only Read/Access Geo-Redundant Storage (RA-GRS)
    0 to 1TB1 ￥0.41/GB ￥0.64/GB ￥0.82/GB ￥1.04/GB
    1TB to 50 TB ￥0.37/GB ￥054/GB ￥0.74/GB ￥0.94/GB
    More than 50 TB ￥0.33/GB ￥0.50/GB ￥0.66/GB ￥0.83/GB

    1 1 TB = 1,024 GB

Operation and Data Transfer Pricing

The followings prices are the HTTP operation costs of Block Blob data and the costs of retrieving data from Block Blob or writing data into Block Blob.

*The following prices are tax-inclusive.

(LRS) (ZRS) (GRS) (RA-GRS)
Writes (per 10,000 counted) ￥0.045 ￥0.045 ￥0.09 ￥0.09
List and create container operations (per 10,000 counted) ￥0.045 ￥0.045 ￥0.045 ￥0.045
Reads (per 10,000 counted) ￥0.015 ￥0.015 ￥0.015 ￥0.015
All other operations (per 10,000 counted) ￥0.015 ￥0.015 ￥0.015 ￥0.015
Data retrieval Free Free Free Free
Data writes (GB) Free Free Free Free
Geo-replication data transfer (GB) Free Free Free Free

Support & SLA

If you have any questions or need help, please visit Azure Support and select self-help service or any other method to contact us for support.

Block Blob itself doesn’t provide financially supported service level agreements. Its availability depends on the used service level for Basic storage. To learn more about the details of the Service Level Agreement, please visit the Service Level Agreements page.
